00029 int RealDiskInterface::Stat(const string& path) {
00030   struct stat st;
00031   if (stat(path.c_str(), &st) < 0) {
00032     if (errno == ENOENT) {
00033       return 0;
00034     } else {
00035       Error("stat(%s): %s", path.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00036       return -1;
00037     }
00038   }
00039 
00040   return st.st_mtime;
00041   return true;
00042 }
00043 
00044 string DirName(const string& path) {
00045 
00046 #ifdef WIN32
00047   const char kPathSeparator = '\\';
00048 #else
00049   const char kPathSeparator = '/';
00050 #endif
00051     
00052   string::size_type slash_pos = path.rfind(kPathSeparator);
00053   if (slash_pos == string::npos)
00054     return "";  // Nothing to do.
00055   while (slash_pos > 0 && path[slash_pos - 1] == kPathSeparator)
00056     --slash_pos;
00057   return path.substr(0, slash_pos);
00058 }
00059 
00060 bool DiskInterface::MakeDirs(const string& path) {
00061   string dir = DirName(path);
00062   if (dir.empty())
00063     return true;  // Reached root; assume it's there.
00064   int mtime = Stat(dir);
00065   if (mtime < 0)
00066     return false;  // Error.
00067   if (mtime > 0)
00068     return true;  // Exists already; we're done.
00069 
00070   // Directory doesn't exist.  Try creating its parent first.
00071   bool success = MakeDirs(dir);
00072   if (!success)
00073     return false;
00074   return MakeDir(dir);
00075 }
00076 
00077 string RealDiskInterface::ReadFile(const string& path, string* err) {
00078   string contents;
00079   int ret = ::ReadFile(path, &contents, err);
00080   if (ret == -ENOENT) {
00081     // Swallow ENOENT.
00082     err->clear();
00083   }
00084   return contents;
00085 }
00086 
00087 bool RealDiskInterface::MakeDir(const string& path) {
00088   if (::MakeDir(path) < 0) {
00089     Error("mkdir(%s): %s", path.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00090     return false;
00091   }
00092   return true;
00093 }
00094 
00095 int RealDiskInterface::RemoveFile(const string& path) {
00096   if (remove(path.c_str()) < 0) {
00097     switch (errno) {
00098       case ENOENT:
00099         return 1;
00100       default:
00101         Error("remove(%s): %s", path.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00102         return -1;
00103     }
00104   } else {
00105     return 0;
00106   }
00107 }

00109 const Rule State::kPhonyRule("phony");
00110 
00111 State::State() : build_log_(NULL) {
00112   AddRule(&kPhonyRule);
00113 }
00114 
00115 const Rule* State::LookupRule(const string& rule_name) {
00116   map<string, const Rule*>::iterator i = rules_.find(rule_name);
00117   if (i == rules_.end())
00118     return NULL;
00119   return i->second;
00120 }
00121 
00122 void State::AddRule(const Rule* rule) {
00123   assert(LookupRule(rule->name_) == NULL);
00124   rules_[rule->name_] = rule;
00125 }
00126 
00127 Edge* State::AddEdge(const Rule* rule) {
00128   Edge* edge = new Edge();
00129   edge->rule_ = rule;
00130   edge->env_ = &bindings_;
00131   edges_.push_back(edge);
00132   return edge;
00133 }
00134 
00135 Node* State::LookupNode(const string& path) {
00136   FileStat* file = stat_cache_.GetFile(path);
00137   if (!file->node_)
00138     return NULL;
00139   return file->node_;
00140 }
00141 
00142 Node* State::GetNode(const string& path) {
00143   FileStat* file = stat_cache_.GetFile(path);
00144   if (!file->node_)
00145     file->node_ = new Node(file);
00146   return file->node_;
00147 }
00148 
00149 void State::AddIn(Edge* edge, const string& path) {
00150   Node* node = GetNode(path);
00151   edge->inputs_.push_back(node);
00152   node->out_edges_.push_back(edge);
00153 }
00154 
00155 void State::AddOut(Edge* edge, const string& path) {
00156   Node* node = GetNode(path);
00157   edge->outputs_.push_back(node);
00158   if (node->in_edge_) {
00159     Warning("multiple rules generate %s. "
00160             "build will not be correct; continuing anyway", path.c_str());
00161   }
00162   node->in_edge_ = edge;
00163 }
00164 
00165 vector<Node*> State::RootNodes(string* err) {
00166   vector<Node*> root_nodes;
00167   // Search for nodes with no output.
00168   for (vector<Edge*>::iterator e = edges_.begin(); e != edges_.end(); ++e) {
00169     for (vector<Node*>::iterator out = (*e)->outputs_.begin();
00170          out != (*e)->outputs_.end(); ++out) {
00171       if ((*out)->out_edges_.empty())
00172         root_nodes.push_back(*out);
00173     }
00174   }
00175 
00176   if (!edges_.empty() && root_nodes.empty())
00177     *err = "could not determine root nodes of build graph";
00178 
00179   assert(edges_.empty() || !root_nodes.empty());
00180   return root_nodes;
00181 }
